group_1.narration: The “Land of Blessings” had one problem...

group_1.textRight: Aoi-chan, let’s play together!

group_1.textLeft: I invited her first. You wait your turn.
Ya pipsqueak runt.

group_1.textRight: I don’t wanna hear that from you and your ugly, overgrown-bush fur!

group_1.textLeft: Are you squabbling again…? Don’t you get tired of fighting every day!?

group_1.narration: The issue with the “Land of Blessings” was @everyone’s unbearable, ceaseless fighting.
Aoi couldn’t help wishing they wouldn’t argue over @little things like those.
But just wishing wasn’t enough to stop their squabbling.
A way for everyone to get along with each other...
A lightbulb went off in Aoi’s head, @as a great idea came to her.

group_1.textCenter: Let’s all go on a picnic, everyone.

group_1.narration: “If everyone understands each other’s positives and @what bothers them, they’ll definitely become friends!”
And so, on the day of the picnic…
While everyone was arguing at first, as they ate @bentos together and chatted among themselves, @they slowly grew to understand one another.

group_1.textLeft: That acorn, it’s from Cozy Woods!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it is.
The acorns picked there are my favorite.

group_1.textLeft: Same for me! All of us should go next time.
I… don’t really like that forest…
My fur gets caught in the branches and it’s hard @to walk through.
Grooming myself afterwards is even more @of a pain.

group_1.textRight: If that’s the case, I can help you?
My mama has stiff fur so I help her brush it @every day.
I’m sure I can do a good job.

group_1.textLeft: You’re okay with that?

group_1.textRight: If I do groom you, wouldn’t you come to @Cozy Woods?

group_1.textLeft: Alright, then please help me out.

group_1.textRight: Okay!

group_1.textLeft: Still, I’ll feel bad if I’m the only one getting any assistance.
The next time I go to Mount Shivery,
I’ll pick some lingonberries for you.

group_1.textRight: Why?

group_1.textLeft: I’ve heard eating that mountain’s lingonberries @makes us grow more.
You’d definitely grow bigger too.

group_1.textRight: Thanks! I’m looking forward to it!

group_1.narration: Having received everyone’s care, the now @smooth-furred Neko-kun was as happy as a clam.
Buta-kun, who used to sigh whenever he saw @his short stature in the mirror, @ate the lingonberries and grew more, @gaining greater confidence in himself.
Ushi-kun loved to gossip. @Being able to talk a lot with everyone, @these days he always had a smile on his face.
Everyone told Aoi “thank you” many times, as it was @her brilliant idea which made all of them happy.

group_1.textRight: ...Hehe. It’s great everyone’s learned to get along @with each other!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, definitely…

group_1.textRight: Although everyone in the “Land of Blessings” @are similar to Mr. Purrs-a-lot’s friends,
they have completely different personalities, @which is interesting.
Aoi-san’s smart and she can rise to the occasion, @I think she’s amazing!
I would also believe it wouldn’t do,
if everyone knew each other, yet were on bad terms and couldn’t play together...

group_1.textLeft: Aoi-chan is someone who acts when it’s needed,
so I think she took action precisely because @it was for everyone else’s sake...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, she’s so cool!

group_1.textLeft: Fufu… I’m glad you enjoyed yourself...

group_1.textRight: This is the story of a girl who’s not just smart, @but also strong and resilient.
No wonder you modelled her after Ai-san.

group_1.textLeft: That’s part of it… but there was another reason...
